summary: This bill, the Sport Fish Restoration, Recreational Boating Safety, and Wildlife Restoration Act of 2025, amends the Dingell-Johnson Sport Fish Restoration Act to update funding allocations, including the division of annual appropriations. It also addresses funding for interstate fisheries commissions and establishes priorities for boating infrastructure, specifically concerning alternative fuel facilities for recreational vessels. Additionally, it modifies the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to implement a 3% tax rate for portable, electronically-aerated bait containers.
